lead_paragraph: Zinedine Zidane is the right man for the job of Real Madrid coach, former team mate David Beckham said on Monday after the Spanish club sacked Rafa Benitez and replaced him with the French World Cup winner.

headline.print_headline: Beckham Hails Zidane as the Right Choice for Real
headline.main: Beckham Hails Zidane as the Right Choice for Real

snippet: Zinedine Zidane is the right man for the job of Real Madrid coach, former team mate David Beckham said on Monday after the Spanish club sacked Rafa Benitez and replaced him with the French World Cup winner....
